result.title: Consensus multi-omics subtypes of paediatric cancers
result.description: Improving existing definition of molecular cancer subtypes in paediatric cancers, based on multiple datasets of the same and of different omics data types. Characterizing the consensus subtypes in terms of implicated molecular mechanisms and interaction with stroma.
